Qg3 { I thought about trying to pressure e5 but it just has too many potential defenders. } 16... b4 { I was happy to see the queenside closed. } 17. Nd1 Bd6 18. Ne3 g6 { No more Nf5 but I have Nc4. } 19. Kh1 { Just wanted to get out of the diagonal in case c4 was pushed but maybe this was unnecessary. } 19... a5 20. Nc4 (20. Qh4 Be7 21. Ng5 h5 22. gxh5 Nxh5 { I didn't like this pin. Missed the idea of Rf5. } 23. Rf5 gxf5 24. Qxh5) 20... Rfe8 21. h4 (21. Nfxe5 Nxe5 22. Nxe5 Bxe5 (22... Re6 { Now I'm just stuck in an unpleasant pin. }) 23. Bxe5 Rxe5 24. Rxf6 { I calculated this line and thought it was great but eventually realized that Black doesn't have to take on e5. }) 21... Kg7 22. Rf2 h6 23. Raf1 Re7 24. Bh3 { Improving the bishop for when g5 is pushed. } 24... Rae8 25. Bc1 { New plan is to target h6. } 25... Kh7 26. Nh2 Kg7 27. Qe3 Ng8 { I missed this move and was surprised to see something so passive. } 28. Rf3 (28. g5 h5 { I didn't like this position. Missed the idea of Rf6, putting my rook on a heavily guarded square. } 29. Rf6 Ndxf6 30. gxf6+ Nxf6 31. Qh6+ Kg8 32. Rxf6) 28... f6 29. g5 fxg5 30. hxg5 h5 31. Qf2 (31. Rf6 { Still did not see this idea. } 31... Ndxf6 (31... Re6)  (31... Rf8) 32. gxf6+ Nxf6) 31... Nb6 32. Nxb6 { I just decided to deflect the queen and infiltrate. Also was in time pressure starting from around here. } 32... Qxb6 33. Rf7+ (33. Rf6 { It still works! }) 33... Kh8 34. Rxe7 Rxe7 35. Qf8 Qc7 { I had a vague plan to try to get my rook onto the 8th rank too but here I realized I had no free squares to move my queen. } 36. Qf3 Bd7 37. Be3 Bxh3 38. Qxh3 Qd7 { I decided the endgame is better for me because of how bad Black's bishop is. } 39. Qxd7 Rxd7 40. Nf3 Rf7 41. Kg2 Kg7 42. Nd2 Rxf1 43. Kxf1 Kf7 44. Nc4 Bc7 45. Bxc5 Ne7 { I had about 1 minute left here. And there's no increment, only 5 seconds delay. :( } 46. Bf2 { Made a snap decision to keep my good bishop but in retrospect I should've just taken the knight. } 46... Nc6 47. Bg3 Ke6 48. Ke2 Bd8 49. Bh4 Nd4+ 50. Kd1 Nf3 51. Bg3 h4 { Missed this move. } 52. Ke2 Nd4+ 53. Kf2 hxg3+ 54. Kxg3 Nxc2 55. Kg4 Ne1 56. Ne3 Nxd3 57. Nd5 Nc1 58. Ne3 Nxb3 59. Nc4 Nc5 60. Nb2 Nxe4 61. Kf3 Nxg5+ 62. Ke3 Bb6+ 63. Kd3 Kd5 64. Nc4 e4+ { I actually flagged this game. Made the last 15 moves in about 30 seconds or something. Now that's how you lose a positionally winning game! } 0-1
